resources.string: You can find out the details of this app by clicking on Details button in the main menu at the top right of the action bar. You can also find out information about the developer in this area. Remember to insert IP address and port of the running server in the settings to connect. Otherwise the app will not work!

Project for the \'Advanced Programming Methods\' exam.
This app communicates with a server capable of building a tree structure starting from examples linked as vectors of attribute-value pairs, for which the numeric target attribute is known.
Through this app you can request to the server the textual representation of the tree generated by a specific training set or you can find out the class value for a specific example.
You can find the whole documentation inside the main project folder.
Name: Francesco\n Surname: Lavecchia\n Student number: 670654
